title: Literary Lounge
caption: Choose a book and a drink
description: Web Application to help choose a great book and a special drink to go with it. Search for your favorite author or choose from our recommendations. Get an idea for an interesting cocktail to accompany your relaxing read!

title: Team Profile Generator
caption: Employee profile page
description: Command-line application to generate team profile of employees in a software engineering team. Simply enter the information about your team members when prompted. The application will create a HTML file with employee details so that the email ids and github repos of employees are handy

title: Weather Dashboard
caption: 5-day weather forecast
description: This web application displays the Current weather and the 5-day weather forecast of city entered. It uses local storage to save your recent searches so that you can easily plan your trip based on the weather.

title: Work Day Scheduler
caption: Plan your work day!
description: A simple work day scheduler app to manage hourly timeblocks. Add important events of a day to hourly timeblocks and manage your time at work efficiently.

title: Timed Code Quiz
caption: Javascript Quiz
description: A timed code quiz on javascript fundamentals

title: Professional README Generator
caption: A quick README for your app
description: A command-line application to generate a professional readme markdown file. Enter the answers to the prompts and a professional README will be generated within seconds.
